name: Maze Game (New World Games, Alex Cline, NightAngel47)
name_original: Maze Game (New World Games, Alex Cline, NightAngel47)
description:
Welcome to the page of Maze Game, the first game from New World Games. Designed by Alex Cline and Programed by Steven Drovie.

Once you play the game, feel free to give us some feedback by taking the survey below. You can report any issues and bugs in the survey. Thank you for playing.

Link to survey:

https://goo.gl/MvZPwc

Feel free to watch this gameplay footage:

Best Wishes,

New World Games
